snippet: Morrison & Foerster says Howard Morris, a former co-chief executive of SNR Denton, is joining the law firm as head of the bankruptcy and restructuring group in London.
abstract: Morrison & Foerster says Howard Morris, a former co-chief executive of SNR Denton, is joining the law firm as head of the bankruptcy and restructuring group in London.

headline.main: Top Restructuring Lawyer Joins Morrison & Foerster
